name: Blueprint: Welcome on the Glade
description:
A welcome event for @blueprint during Fall 2021!

  • Our student org welcomes new members every semester at UC Berkeley's Memorial Glade
  • During Fall 2021, we were fully remote
  • This file was used to supplement our welcome event


Please note that all the activities in this file are pretty specific to our club's traditions - I wouldn't recommend trying to use most of this file for your own events :') But I hope it can be a resource for something you create!


Published for Config 2021. Learn more about this project at Config!
